:::{#person-profile}

I am an undergraduate Biological Sciences student specialising in Genetics and Genomics. My academic interests lie in bioinformatics, population substructure and bioinformatics. I am currently researching the Jordanian population substructure for my research project. Beyond my studies, I take part in the Arab Society and enjoy playing football.
